website_summaries.verdict: We like this bag's sleek metallic look, but depending on regulations, it might have to be checked at the airport.
pros: 100% polycarbonate outer shell with fashionable metallic finish
Spinner wheels are doubled, improving mobility
Main compartment expands up to 2 inches
cons: Overall dimensions can exceed carry-on limits if not closed correctly
No external pockets for travel papers or other items

customer_reviews.title: The search is over.
customer_reviews.text: I love this suitcase. I had a real OCD moment while searching for the perfect carry on and I found this lil baby. From the laptop compartment in the front, to the awesome lock, to the sturdy though lightweight feel, to the fact that you can cram in a good amount of clothing, it's a winner. After probably 8 hours of searching, I'm glad I found a perfect case for my travels.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Quality Luggage Shipped Quickly, but there is a price limit.....
customer_reviews.text: Needed a US carry on quickly and was interested in getting a quality product. Kelsey did it. The 21" size did fit in the airline luggage space (even with the wheels). The quality of luggage was good, but I did by a "used version" at a lower than retail price. I do not believe the brand name (quality) warrants some of the extreme price tags. The International version (19 inch) of this brand is way way overpriced given its quality and capability.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Levit

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty good for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: Just received the suitcase. Looks pretty good for the price paid. We'll see how it fares with a few business trips. Just a heads up - "Blue" is the same as "Cobalt Blue" but its a cheaper price if you're trying to decide what color to get... I didn't care, was just looking for the cheapest version, so Blue was the call!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic L

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection - Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: Used it on a trip to Europe and it was great. Easy to wheel, durable construction, lots of room but still able to get it in the overhead on international flights. Held up well as checked luggage. Light weight but still very durable. Loved the wheels for easy maneuverability around the airports and hotels. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: The T's

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Luggage
customer_reviews.text: These Helium Aero bags are the best. Light and sturdy, excellent rollers and handle. Expandable. I wouldn't own any other brand. We check bags when we fly, even the carryon sizes, because we don't want to haul any bags through the airport. These bags are definitely sturdy enough to stand up to rough handling.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Firma

customer_reviews.title: Landfill-bound
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Poor design. The handle won't pull out/extend when the suitcase if full - something is binding. So, back it goes, into a landfill - so that they can send me whatever new version China is sending us, since we can't do anything for ourselves anymore (other than take time to sell/deliver/return/landfill stuff from China).
customer_reviews.author: Hirvine

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suitcase for my daughter for a trip to Italy because of the great reviews. Unfortunately, the telescopic handle stopped extending fully in the first city of our trip — causing her to need to hunch over to wheel her bag for the rest of the trip. I baught my other daughter a Samsonite Omni Hardside spinner, which worked great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Handle Broke on 2nd trip
customer_reviews.text: The size is good and fits in overhead bins. The case looks nice but marks and scratches easily. The handle on mine broke during my second use and I had carry it instead of rolling it. Still working on warranty. seems to be a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Marlop

customer_reviews.title: Good case. Made it to Europe and back on ...
customer_reviews.text: Good case. Made it to Europe and back on trains and planes and as checked luggage without any issues. The handle is a bit fussy but it works with patience. The expandable side zip really helped with my souvenirs. Liked the interior straps and pockets-really helped organize my stuff. I did not use the TSA locks as so many travelers said theirs were cut off by TSA.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Weighs nothing!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to maneuver. Really nice color and shine. Enough room to pack without cramming clothes. I haven’t flown with it yet so don’t know how it will hold up. I like the lock. Simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and fits in every overhead bin I have tried
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and fits in every overhead bin I have tried. Technically, if you want it to fit in the little basket at the flight attendants desk then you probably need to buy the smaller international version. But it fits on the plane and allows me to carry more stuff and that is what I really care about.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Very versatile and hardy
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Very versatile and hardy. Only one small issue if you overpack it and don't​ expand it the handles get stuck, simple issue that can be fixed with expanding the suitcase. I did not know this and went through the hassle of returning the first one because I thought it was defective. I would buy this one again. Just purchased one in black.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo L Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Good but not super durable
customer_reviews.text: So: this was a decent enough suitcase - decent capacity, wheels mostly rolled well - and I got a fair amount of use out of it as both carry on and checked luggage. Unfortunately one of the wheels broke after 15 months and it’s juuuuuust a bit to big to be hand luggage....
customer_reviews.author: daphid

customer_reviews.title: Expandable handle gets STUCK
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pieces of this luggage 2 years ago. After the first use, the expandable handle of the carryon would get stuck and not go down without force. I thought it was just an unlucky piece since this line got such high reviews but after a few uses of the bigger luggage, the expandable handle also gets stuck. What a waste of money. Will never buy Delsey again.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Molina

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase! It is now nearly 2 years since ...
customer_reviews.text: Great suitcase! It is now nearly 2 years since I've bought it and it is still shiny and new :) the electric blue color also makes it stands out.
customer_reviews.author: emile

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I did receive a new replacement in two days. I'm very happy with this one as it has not been opened before so the combination lock was all set to Zero as the first one should have been. This carry on is very well made. In the future if needed , I would buy another one .
customer_reviews.author: Sam V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Because it’s a spinner, the wheels add inches to the size and this bag will not fit “wheels out” in some airplanes. I confirmed this in the 737-700, an older Southwest plane. The space inside and organization ability is good. Nice quality for the price. With spinners the handle tends to wear out due to torque, this handle seems sturdy enough to last. Plus 10 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reising

customer_reviews.title: It's a great stylish alternative to the standard black canvas carry on ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable, lightweight, and sleek-looking. It's convenient for travel given the design and 360 deg wheels. I have not had issues with scratching, but I also have only used it as carry on luggage and haven't had to check it yet. It's a great stylish alternative to the standard black canvas carry on suitcase the majority of travelers use!
customer_reviews.author: Jen L.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Amazing price. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for months and I travel by plane at least once a month. It has been amazing. Absolutely no problems. I’ve had multiple people ask where I got it! Also I fit more in this suitcase than I ever have in any other carry on. I can pack for a week to two weeks of clothes with two pairs of shoes and all my cosmetics. It fits perfect in the overhead. No scratches, no dents. I can’t give a better review. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M Klein

customer_reviews.title: wheels and handle are good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: wheels and handle are good for traveling, pretty low-intensity rolling through the airport. this suitcase took the place of the rockland spinner i had previously (garbage). biggest issue i have found is the length. for a lot of overhead compartments, it's just slightly too long to go in vertically, so i end up either having see if it will work with wheels out or put it in sideways and feel like a jerk for taking up so much room. a minor thing, but it's really a major thing if you travel every week.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah LaBruce

customer_reviews.title: This bad boy got me through 8 European countries with barely ...
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy got me through 8 European countries with barely a scratch. The wheels are durable, the lock works great, and oh god the color is AWESOME. Never had a problem with international carry-on standards. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Walker Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome small bag for quick trips to avoid checking a ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome small bag for quick trips to avoid checking a bag. I was able to pack for a week long trip without sacrificing that extra pair of socks or undies. :)
customer_reviews.author: Randolph W. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on luggage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my son he loved it on our first trip we only took carry on. Easy to move. Handle is a little loose but didn’t have any problems
customer_reviews.author: Delonna J McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carry-on
customer_reviews.text: Great little suitcase. Managed to pack 1 week worth of clothing into it. Nice color and easy to roll and store in overhead compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and well built
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, light, sturdy, and maximizes carry on baggage size. Wheels and extension handle are well built and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Quality spinner
customer_reviews.text: Love Delsey products. Lightweight and high quality. Could use a bit more organization pockets inside. Definitely carry-on size.
customer_reviews.author: flowerchildmadison

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Taken on a recent 4 day trip to Nashville. Held everything that it needed to hold and still had a little room. Didn't check the bag, so can't say how well it will hold up, but it did fit in the overhead of Southwest Airlines with zero problems. Easy to move around and super lightweight. Glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Factors

customer_reviews.title: it wheels easily, love the inside compartments
customer_reviews.text: Just used this suitcase, it wheels easily, love the inside compartments. Arrived on time just as advertised. Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and my husband loves it. He finally got to use it and he says its excellent. It rolls very smoothly and he highly recommends the brand
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Was good initially, but not so much after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: The case was great for the first 3 months of use (about 6 trips), but now the notches on the lever will not expand and I cannot keep the handle extended. I would appreciate a new case.
customer_reviews.author: Gottahave

customer_reviews.title: I would have loved to give it the full 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved to give it the full 5 stars but the compartments inside this bag (just like the bigger size) lacks pockets and shirt holders etc. It is basically divided as upper and lower sections. The upper section/cover doesn't have any belts to hold shirts or pockets for small items etc.
customer_reviews.author: Hend Farid

customer_reviews.title: Pull out handle broken
customer_reviews.text: The overall luggage is fine but the pull out handle mechanism broke after out fist use...it locks in the extended position and simply will not collapse again. Very disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve I.

customer_reviews.title: Good suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this suitcase! It came back from 4 weeks in Europe (3 flights) looking good. It's easy to pack and you can get a lot of stuff into it but the size is so easy to manage. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: canadashopper

customer_reviews.title: Classy Bag for my world travels
customer_reviews.text: Loooove my Delsy luggage. I'm reviewing after over a year of traveling internationally,, sometimes checking and sometimes carrying on. Other than some scuffs from usage (to be expected) it is in excellent condition. I will buy more of this brand/line for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with deep scratches in it. I am going on vacation in a few days and I paid $25 for overnite shipping. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Wolcott

customer_reviews.title: Got some for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: Loved them enough to buy for my entire family! Light enough for my little guy to pull in the airport and big enough for me to put all my stuff in. Happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: 😊 a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: 😊 this is the first time I am writing a review and it is because I absolutely love this case! I frequently travel on domestic flights and use public transportation to get to the airports, the wheels on this luggage, the size and weight make it an absolute must-have.
customer_reviews.author: Fefe

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Worked well until the handle kept getting stuck mid way .
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle G

customer_reviews.title: It is also very lightweight and extremely easy to push
customer_reviews.text: This luggage is just what I was looking for. It can be used as a carry-on, but stands up to baggage handling if you check it. It is also very lightweight and extremely easy to push.
customer_reviews.author: Liv'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Delsey Luggage Helium Aero Carryon Spinner
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to maneuver. Because the interior is boxy it can carry a lot of clothing and other gear. If a zippered exterior pocket is important to you this carryon may not be for you. Not a problem for me. Great wheels! I also bought a second one for my daughter and a 29 inch size checkin for my daughter in law. I guess that is a compliment to this luggage.
customer_reviews.author: lorrie savage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking piece of luggage. Disappointed that it won't fit inside 25" for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Minky's G-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love this luggage
customer_reviews.text: Love this luggage, it scratched the first time I used it but it is very protective and you can fit so much in it! Was used as a carry-on and fit perfectly in the overhead compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much for ourselves and as gifts
customer_reviews.text: This luggage is the best. It packs beautifully, and it is so easy to push through airports. It also makes a great graduation or birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lifelong Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case. It arrived on time and was well packaged (double boxed) but it did have a small dent on one side. I did not return it because I needed it for a a trip. It will get dented and scratched over time if you fly.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.M in TN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent expansion when needed!
customer_reviews.text: One thing that sets this apart from similar bags is the solid tie down straps that really keep contents compressed as opposed to wimpy thin elastic straps.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Dietze

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a set of 3 of these for a couple of trips. The carry on is very light, wheels easily and the handle has 2 postions and the handles extend and close easily. Fits in the overhead compartment with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: RBradford

customer_reviews.title: Size is great but exterior scratches easily and problematic when the airline ...
customer_reviews.text: Size is great but exterior scratches easily and problematic when the airline place the stickers on the luggage -- so know that it will go from pristine to "used" very quickly (even if you never check your luggage).
customer_reviews.author: Ladybirdskk

customer_reviews.title: Nice suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Great travel suitcase. Lightweight and easy to move around. Looks really nice but will caution that with the shiny finish, the suitcase gets scratched up fast.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom from NY

customer_reviews.title: My favorite color
customer_reviews.text: Durable, great looking and the perfect size for short trips
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is handsome looking, functions great, and holds everything I need for a two or three day trip. Rolls well through the airport and fits the overheads that I've used so far.
customer_reviews.author: jrltll

customer_reviews.title: Tough yet lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for our college age girls. Love, love. Tough yet lightweight. Only one domestic plane trip so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lana W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Lightweight yet sturdy. It easily expands a couple of inches and rolls around easily.
customer_reviews.author: Martie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great case, withstood the gorillas at the airport! highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: MPetrock

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and how well this carry on accommodates our stuff. Nice construction and compact enough to carry on for overhead compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie K. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on. Great looks
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Rolls okay on carpet. Could be better. Sturdy. Great carry on.
customer_reviews.author: SD Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great and reasonably priced....
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Rolls well so far on every surface I tried. It contained a zip up area inside to separate both sides from each other.
customer_reviews.author: mikef

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product and it arrived with a large scuff on the back so I requested a replacement. Replacement arrived with large scuff on the back as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: I bought this pretty suitcase to take on my vacation and it worked ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pretty suitcase to take on my vacation and it worked just right, it may look small but its big from inside it served me well for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too big for a carry on but great for checked bags. The wheels are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, light weight, and big capacity
customer_reviews.text: Will buy again, highly recommended to all looking for a nice, light weight, and big capacity carry-on size luggage. 5 starts
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for someone who just started traveling. I want one of my own! Very light, convenient and can overstuff without issue. I love the way it turns sideways to fit down the aisle! Its great!
customer_reviews.author: R H

customer_reviews.title: The lock was broke when I received the delivery. ...
customer_reviews.text: The lock was broke when I received the delivery. I was leaving on a trip and didn't have time to return. I bought other pieces so I had to keep it
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling and holds up to bag people throwing it around.
customer_reviews.author: GR81

customer_reviews.title: Great case, lasted a few years
customer_reviews.text: Zip brock and pulled away from case as sewing thread gave way. It had a lot of use up until that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant suit case...I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very light, the design may be difficult for those not so light packers yet it can carry a lot if packed properly and smartly. I would recommend this bag for anyone switching to hard shell for the first time. Very elegant colour and easy to catch at the airport, this is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: A great item
customer_reviews.text: Could not be more happy with purchase. High quality which really works on a trip. Very Very satisfied after using it on a cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of luggage and it indeed fit in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of luggage and it indeed fit in the overhead. The wheels did great and moved in all directions. I am very pleased with this piece of luggage and was able to get three days of clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Shel St. James

customer_reviews.title: Great if you are a light packer!
customer_reviews.text: Great suit case if you are a light packet. The handle will not go up if there is too much in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, weight, shape for overhead. SO easy to maneuver!
customer_reviews.author: Dasher

customer_reviews.title: not sure
customer_reviews.text: the 1st one arrived with the handle broken right out of the box. To the credit of Amazon, they sent a replacement right away. Have not used the replacement yet, hopefully it holds up on the trip....Although, I should not have to be concerned when paying this much for a bag, but because of the 1st broken one, I will end up worrying.
customer_reviews.author: LivingInEcuador

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size is borderline unacceptable as carry-on With some companies they did not allow me to take it on board.
customer_reviews.author: Eric The Bloodthirsty

customer_reviews.title: rolls SO easily and goes down aisle well
customer_reviews.text: fits well more than I expected. fit my and my 1 yr. old's cloths, a collapsable high chair, a breast pump, for 10 days! (had shoes in other luggage). rolls SO easily and goes down aisle well. great luggage
customer_reviews.author: Magnetic Tape

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to roll. Fits in overhead compartment. Functional design.
customer_reviews.author: Apple loyalist

customer_reviews.title: Too big for overhead bin
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the color of this suitcase and the quality. I bought it as a carry on for a trip to Costa Rica. Unfortunately had to return it because it's too big. I ordered the Helium titanium as well which was also too big. Ultimately trying the International carry on to see if it would work. I do use compression sacks to help with putting more into the luggage. Other than it being too big for a carry-on​, its a really nice suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! I bought small and medium, travelled with both already! Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Potomac

customer_reviews.title: Had my doubts about the size so returned it
customer_reviews.text: It looked very big when I received, especially when next to my old carry on... I returned it because I wasn't sure it would be accepted as a carry on on all flights. Otherwise, it looked great! Would have kept if was smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Sam_Sam

customer_reviews.title: This is a great suitcase. We bought one but it was so ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great suitcase. We bought one but it was so easy and wonderful to use that we have purchased another. The wheels make it easy to maneuver up and down airplane aisles and it is light and easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great cool
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and great cool. Not giving 5stars because of the $15 price drop a month after I bought it :(
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, but very heavy once fully loaded. Wheels easily but if you have to check it underneath the plane, it's gets badly scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent product/price
customer_reviews.text: purchase was exactly as expected. ordered as a gift for a service award. hope they like it. will report otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Delsey luggage
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece of luggage. It is light and just the right size. Holds enough clothes for a woman who always over packs. The only thing is you have to lay both sides flat to open. That is a minor issue. I will use it often.
customer_reviews.author: julie frischmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Does scratch up easily but thenitjustlooks used and well traveled
customer_reviews.text: Small suitcase that feels huge! Image used thisforquicky weekend trips and am planning on usingitfor a week Neuroptera. It feels very spacious and protects my belongings from weather and being thrown around in the airport. Does scratch up easily but thenitjustlooks used and well traveled.
customer_reviews.author: mleeps

customer_reviews.title: ... got this suitcase upon an NYT recommendation as the best carry-on. This is far from it
customer_reviews.text: I got this suitcase upon an NYT recommendation as the best carry-on. This is far from it. The suitcase seems too thin and weak to endure frequent traveling. I was not able to test its durability because in less than 5 months of light use the combination lock broke. I was abroad and could not return the product before May and now I am stock with a suitcase that cannot be locked. The lock is essential for me as I travel to low income regions where I need to lock my belongings.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase is very poorly constructed. After 3 uses both wheels fell off and the plastic is faulty. The guy at the airport laughed and said it was defective but the luggage company will not take it back. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gone on any trips yet, but the first impression is very good. I really like the blue color, and it appears to be a quality build. The built-in TSA lock is nice, and overall the piece has a very classy appearance. The interior divider seems to be of good quality. Overall, quite pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DS785

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: very lightweight, roomy and maneuverable - bought it for my 11 yr. old granddaughter. She loves it. Now I want one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Young

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic suitcase.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this suitcase. It has made many trips on airplanes and it has made it this far without any dents and collapses. It rolls very easily and is bigger on the inside than you would believe. If you need a compact suitcase that holds a lot, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Form over function
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble with the wheels. For the price, I was very disappointed. I do not recommend this product, the two stars are for the sleek design and beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne F.

customer_reviews.title: Performed Well
customer_reviews.text: Ease of pull and holds a lot. Really liked the locking system. Used on trips and held up very well. Marks cleaned up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Moss

customer_reviews.title: They were delivered in perfect condition and look great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 in 2 sizes. They were delivered in perfect condition and look great. I haven't used them as yet. The first test of durability and ease of use will be in December.
customer_reviews.author: sblang

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, I typically really like Delsey. Only complaint is that it does not roll well on carpet, and with my puter bag on top. Locking mechanism nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer WA

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this for a funeral trip to Baltimore. Seemed ok until I got to the airport. Handle refused to extend further than the first position. For a child this would be fine, but for a 6' tall man I was forced to stroll through the airport crouched over like Quasimodo. On arrival at my hotel I attempted to unzip the case when the zipper separated and all my clothing spilled out on the floor. Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Shipped the incorrect size twice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this piece of luggage twice and had the same result each time. The description says 21" but I received the 25" bag both times. Not sure what the issue is. The shipping label with barcode on both boxes even shoes two different bag sizes. My husband has this bag in graphite and loves it. All I wanted was a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Mazza

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality but known to have chemicals which can cause cancer
customer_reviews.text: Great. Noticed that product comes with a notice that it has chemicals which are known to cause cancer in the state of California. Also the luggage outer shell can get scratches while traveling. It comes with Delcy global warranty for 10 years
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh Prabhu

customer_reviews.title: Held up good and were still rolling
customer_reviews.text: Have had this and the matching 29 for a year now with several long and rough trips. Held up good and were still rolling!
customer_reviews.author: John Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. Well made, great color, plenty of room for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shaes.mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of luggage
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best piece of luggage I have ever owned !!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Berlatsky

customer_reviews.text: I like the bag but the key was lost in shipping.The color was just what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, really like the quality of this suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, really like the quality of this suitcase! Simple and easy to use, a little bigger than expected, but all godo!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Just what my wife wanted for Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: It has quality rollers and good storage capacity. She is concerned how well the outer shell will look after being checked in (with friction, rubbing from other luggage).
customer_reviews.author: R. Rimple

product_meta.title: DELSEY Paris Helium Aero Hardside Expandable Luggage with Spinner Wheels, Blue Cobalt, Carry-On 21 Inch
product_meta.description: Size:Carry-On 21 Inch| Color:Blue CobaltSecure & stylish Helium Aero collection makes your next adventure as safe as possible. This collection features two full packing compartments and is created with 100% polycarbonate material. The TSA-accepted lock provides maximum security and allows only TSA agents to access your belongings during travel. Established in 1946, Delsey has used its flair to marry tradition with innovation, elegance with modernity and design with practicality. We design tomorrow's luggage with inspiration from many places: travelers and their journeys, societal changes and the evolving environment. As a result our luggage keeps getting lighter, better fitted and more environmentally friendly. Enabling our customers to travel elegantly and limiting any negative impact on the environment is our raison d’être.
feature_bullets: Lightweight and Durable: Made of 100% Polycarbonate, which is a material that is extremely resilient to cracking or breaking, with a deep metallic finish
Superior Maneuverability: The double spinner wheels assure exceptional maneuverability and keep ZERO weight on your arm.
Largest Capacity: This suitcase expands up to 2 inches for additional packing space. This feature is great for packing sovenirs on return journeys.
Maximum Comfort: This carry on bag has a comfortable handle system that locks into two positions for ease of use.

Convenient and Secure Packing: Two large fully-lined compartments with multiple pockets allow easy access and organization for all of your items. Web straps and a zippered divider secure clothing and help minimize wrinkles, Fully lined interior with two compartments for packing and organizing clothes and travel accessories
100% polycarbonate with glossy finish which makes the case extremely lightweight,Integrated 3-dial tsa-accepted combination lock
Four twin spinner wheels assuring multi-directional rolling and optional stability with zero weight on your hand
Recessed "one-button" locking handle system with industrial grade aluminum tubes and molded ergonomic comfort grip handle, Dimension: 21 x 14.5 x 10 inches

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
